description: Enumerates saved credentials via cmdkey and vaultcmd, consolidates Generic and Windows Vault entries, and flags Microsoft/Windows accounts, Git/GitHub credentials, and any Vault-stored secrets. Outputs NDJSON (summary + per-credential) and writes atomically to the Active Response log with .new fallback.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
